item.title: Arrest made in SF killing of Bob Lee â€“ alleged killer also worked in tech
item.description: An arrest has been made in the killing of tech executive Bob Lee, and the alleged killer also worked in tech and was known to Lee.

item.title: YouTube-DL Hosting Ban Paves the Way to Privatized Censorship
item.description: A German court has ruled Uberspace liable for hosting the website of youtube-dl - an open-source tool that allows for downloading YouTube content.

item.title: The art of auto engineering
item.description: The Art of Auto Engineering is a complete video course composed of 122+ lessons with 20 hours of footage explaining every single part of a car in great detail, covering the basics to advanced automotive engineering.

item.title: Apple will use 100 percent recycled cobalt in batteries by 2025
item.description: Apple has announced its plan to use 100% recycled cobalt in all Apple-designed batteries by 2025, alongside entirely recycled rare earth elements for magnets and 100% recycled tin for circuit boards.

item.title: We achieved a 6-fold increase in Podman startup speed
item.description: Red Hat's container engine, Podman, achieved a 6-fold increase in startup speed by removing unnecessary processes and addressing minor inefficiencies that impact critical applications like cars, where near-real-time container startup is essential.

item.title: Improving Tailscale via Apple's open source
item.description: The Tailscale team used Apple's open source to debug network-interface related bugs for their 1.36 release, relying on ifconfig to determine the active network interface.

item.title: Animated Drawings
item.description: The 'Animated Drawings' repository on Github implements the algorithm described in the paper 'A Method for Automatically Animating Children's Drawings of the Human Figure', allowing users to create custom animations featuring their own hand-drawn characters.

item.title: Amazon CodeWhisperer, Free for Individual Use, Is Now Generally Available
item.description: Amazon CodeWhisperer, a real-time AI coding companion, is now generally available and includes a CodeWhisperer Individual tier that's free for all developers to use.

item.title: Google has already pulled six products in 2023
item.description: Google has shut down six products in the first four months of 2023, including the Code Jam programming competition, social media platform Google Currents, the Street View app, wearable tech Google Jacquard, cloud gaming service Google Stadia, and wireless router Google OnHub.

item.title: Nvidia RTX Remix Runtime Open Source Available Now
item.description: Nvidia has released the RTX Remix runtime, an open source modding platform for remastering classic DirectX 8 and 9 games with path tracing, AI-enhanced textures, and user-created assets.
